methods.name: registerPlugin
methods.description: If the plugin is not added, add the plugin and call the 'add' function. - If the plugin is added call callBack function.

methods.name: run
methods.params: command: string, type: string, button?: (Node | null) | undefined
methods.description: Run plugin calls and basic commands.

methods.name: commandHandler
methods.description: Execute default command of command button - (selectAll, codeView, fullScreen, indent, outdent, undo, redo, removeFormat, print, preview, showBlocks, save, bold, underline, italic, strike, subscript, superscript, copy, cut, paste)

methods.name: runFromTarget
methods.description: Execute "editor.run" with command button.

methods.name: applyCommandTargets
methods.description: It is executed by inserting the button of commandTargets as the argument value of the "f" function. - "func" is called as long as the button array's length.

methods.name: applyFrameRoots
methods.description: Execute a function by traversing all root targets.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Checks if the content of the editor is empty. - Display criteria for "placeholder".

methods.name: setDir
methods.description: Set direction to "rtl" or "ltr".

methods.name: resetOptions
methods.description: Add or reset option property (Editor is reloaded)

methods.name: changeFrameContext
methods.description: Change the current root index.

methods.name: execCommand
methods.params: command: string, showDefaultUI?: boolean | undefined, value?: string | undefined
methods.description: javascript execCommand

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus to wysiwyg area

methods.name: focusEdge
methods.description: If "focusEl" is a component, then that component is selected; if it is a format element, the last text is selected - If "focusEdge" is null, then selected last element

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Focusout to wysiwyg area (.blur()) /

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroy the suneditor /

methods.name: check
methods.description: Returns false if char count is greater than "frameOptions.get('charCounter_max')" when "html" is added to the current editor.

methods.name: getLength
methods.description: Get the [content]'s number of characters or binary data size. (frameOptions.get('charCounter_type')) - If [content] is undefined, get the current editor's number of characters or binary data size.

methods.name: display
methods.description: Set the char count to charCounter element textContent.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Returns false if char count is greater than "frameOptions.get('charCounter_max')" when "inputText" is added to the current editor. - If the current number of characters is greater than "charCounter_max", the excess characters are removed. And call the char.display()

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts an element and returns it. (Used for elements: table, hr, image, video) - If "element" is "HR", inserts and returns the new line.

methods.name: applyInsertBehavior
methods.params: container: Node, oNode?: Node | null, insertBehavior?: __se__ComponentInsertBehaviorType
methods.description: Handles post-insertion behavior for a newly created component based on the specified mode.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets the file component and that plugin name - return: {target, component, pluginName} | null

methods.name: select
methods.description: The component(media, file component, table, etc) is selected and the resizing module is called.

methods.name: deselect
methods.description: Deselects the selected component. /

methods.name: is
methods.description: Determines if the specified node is a block component (e.g., img, iframe, video, audio, table) with the class "se-component" - or a direct FIGURE node. This function checks if the node itself is a component - or if it belongs to any components identified by the component manager.

methods.name: isInline
methods.description: Checks if the given node is an inline component (class "se-inline-component"). - If the node is a FIGURE, it checks the parent element instead. - It also verifies whether the node is part of an inline component recognized by the component manager.

methods.name: isBasic
methods.description: Checks if the specified node qualifies as a basic component within the editor. - This function verifies whether the node is recognized as a component by the `is` function, while also ensuring that it is not an inline component as determined by the `isInline` function. - This is used to identify block-level elements or standalone components that are not part of the inline component classification.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copies the specified component node to the clipboard. - This function is different from the one called when the user presses the "Ctrl + C" key combination.

methods.name: setLine
methods.description: Replace the line tag of the current selection.

methods.name: getLine
methods.params: node: Node, validation?: ((current: Node) => boolean) | null
methods.description: If a parent node that contains an argument node finds a format node (format.isLine), it returns that node.

methods.name: setBrLine
methods.description: Replace the br-line tag of the current selection.

methods.name: getBrLine
methods.params: element: Node, validation?: ((current: Node) => boolean) | null
methods.description: If a parent node that contains an argument node finds a "brLine" (format.isBrLine), it returns that node.

methods.name: addLine
methods.params: element: Node, lineNode?: string | Node | null
methods.description: Append "line" element to sibling node of argument element. - If the "lineNode" argument value is present, the tag of that argument value is inserted, - If not, the currently selected format tag is inserted.

methods.name: getBlock
methods.params: element: Node, validation?: ((current: Node) => boolean) | null
methods.description: If a parent node that contains an argument node finds a format node (format.isBlock), it returns that node.

methods.name: applyBlock
methods.description: Appended all selected "line" element to the argument element("block") and insert

methods.name: removeBlock
methods.description: The elements of the "selectedFormats" array are detached from the "blockElement" element. ("LI" tags are converted to "P" tags) - When "selectedFormats" is null, all elements are detached and return {cc: parentNode, sc: nextSibling, ec: previousSibling, removeArray: [Array of removed elements]}.

methods.name: indent
methods.description: Indent more the selected lines. - margin size : 'status.indentSize'px /

methods.name: outdent
methods.description: Indent less the selected lines. - margin size - "status.indentSize"px /

methods.name: isEdgeLine
methods.description: Check if the container and offset values are the edges of the "line"

methods.name: isTextStyleNode
methods.description: It is judged whether it is a node related to the text style.

methods.name: isLine
methods.description: It is judged whether it is the "line" element. - (P, DIV, H[1-6], PRE, LI | class="__se__format__line_xxx") - "line" element also contain "brLine" element

methods.name: isNormalLine
methods.description: It is judged whether it is the only "line" element.

methods.name: isBrLine
methods.description: It is judged whether it is the "brLine" element. - (PRE | class="__se__format__br_line_xxx") - "brLine" elements is included in the "line" element. - "brLine" elements's line break is "BR" tag. ※ Entering the Enter key in the space on the last line ends "brLine" and appends "line".

methods.name: isBlock
methods.description: It is judged whether it is the "block" element. - (BLOCKQUOTE, OL, UL, FIGCAPTION, TABLE, THEAD, TBODY, TR, TH, TD | class="__se__format__block_xxx") - "block" is wrap the "line" and "component"

methods.name: isClosureBlock
methods.description: It is judged whether it is the "closureBlock" element. - (TH, TD | class="__se__format__block_closure_xxx") - "closureBlock" elements is included in the "block". - "closureBlock" element is wrap the "line" and "component" - ※ You cannot exit this format with the Enter key or Backspace key. - ※ Use it only in special cases. ([ex] format of table cells)

methods.name: isClosureBrLine
methods.description: It is judged whether it is the "closureBrLine" element. - (class="__se__format__br_line__closure_xxx") - "closureBrLine" elements is included in the "brLine". - "closureBrLine" elements's line break is "BR" tag. - ※ You cannot exit this format with the Enter key or Backspace key. - ※ Use it only in special cases. ([ex] format of table cells)

methods.name: getLines
methods.description: Returns a "line" array from selected range.

methods.name: getLinesAndComponents
methods.description: Get lines and components from the selected range. (P, DIV, H[1-6], OL, UL, TABLE..) - If some of the component are included in the selection, get the entire that component.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Filters an HTML string based on allowed and disallowed tags, with optional custom validation. - Removes blacklisted tags and keeps only whitelisted tags. - Allows custom validation functions to replace, modify, or remove elements.

methods.name: clean
methods.description: Cleans and compresses HTML code to suit the editor format.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts an (HTML element / HTML string / plain string) at the selection range. - If "frameOptions.get('charCounter_max')" is exceeded when "html" is added, null is returned without addition.

methods.name: insertNode
methods.description: Delete selected node and insert argument value node and return. - If the "afterNode" exists, it is inserted after the "afterNode" - Inserting a text node merges with both text nodes on both sides and returns a new "{ container, startOffset, endOffset }".

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Delete the selected range.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets the current content

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets the HTML string to the editor content

methods.name: add
methods.description: Add content to the end of content.

methods.name: getJson
methods.description: Gets the current content to JSON data

methods.name: setJson
methods.description: Sets the JSON data to the editor content

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Call "clipboard.write" to copy the contents and display a success/failure toast message.

methods.name: setFullPage
methods.description: Sets the content of the iframe's head tag and body tag when using the "iframe" or "iframe_fullPage" option.

methods.name: compress
methods.description: HTML code compression

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Adds, updates, or deletes style nodes from selected text (a, span, strong, etc.). - 1. If styleNode is provided, a node with the same tags and attributes is added to the selected text. - 2. If the same tag already exists, only its attributes are updated. - 3. If styleNode is null, existing nodes are updated or removed without adding new ones. - 4. Styles matching those in stylesToModify are removed. (Use CSS attribute names, e.g., "background-color") - 5. Classes matching those in stylesToModify (prefixed with ".") are removed. - 6. stylesToModify is used to avoid duplicate property values from styleNode. - 7. Nodes with all styles and classes removed are deleted if they match styleNode, are in nodesToRemove, or if styleNode is null. - 8. Tags matching names in nodesToRemove are deleted regardless of their style and class. - 9. If strictRemove is true, nodes in nodesToRemove are only removed if all their styles and classes are removed. - 10. The function won't modify nodes if the parent has the same class and style values. - However, if nodesToRemove has values, it will work and separate text nodes even if there's no node to replace.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Remove all inline formats (styles and tags) from the currently selected text. - This is a convenience method that calls apply() with null parameters to strip all formatting. - Removes all inline style nodes (span, strong, em, a, etc.) - Preserves only the plain text content - Works on the current selection or collapsed cursor position /

methods.name: apply
methods.params: type: string, selectedCells: Array<Node>, nested: boolean
methods.description: Append all selected "line" element to the list and insert.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: "selectedCells" array are detached from the list element. - The return value is applied when the first and last lines of "selectedFormats" are "LI" respectively.

methods.name: applyNested
methods.description: Nest list cells or cancel nested cells.

methods.name: removeNested
methods.description: Detach Nested all nested lists under the "baseNode". - Returns a list with nested removed.

methods.name: initDropdownTarget
methods.description: Method for managing dropdown element. - You must add the "dropdown" element using the this method at custom plugin.

methods.name: dropdownOn
methods.description: Opens the dropdown menu for the specified button.

methods.name: dropdownOff
methods.description: Closes the currently open dropdown menu. /

methods.name: containerOn
methods.description: Opens the menu container for the specified button.

methods.name: containerOff
methods.description: Closes the currently open menu container. /

methods.name: split
methods.params: baseNode: Node, offset: number | Node | null, depth?: number
methods.description: Split all tags based on "baseNode"

methods.name: mergeSameTags
methods.params: element: Node, nodePathArray?: number[][] | null, onlyText?: boolean | null
methods.description: Use with "npdePath (dom-query-GetNodePath)" to merge the same attributes and tags if they are present and modify the nodepath. - If "offset" has been changed, it will return as much "offset" as it has been modified. - An array containing change offsets is returned in the order of the "nodePathArray" array.

methods.name: mergeNestedTags
methods.params: element: Node, validation?: ((current: Node) => boolean) | string | null
methods.description: Remove nested tags without other child nodes.

methods.name: removeAllParents
methods.params: item: Node, validation?: ((current: Node) => boolean) | null, stopParent?: Node | null
methods.description: Delete itself and all parent nodes that match the condition. - Returns an {sc: previousSibling, ec: nextSibling}(the deleted node reference) or null.

methods.name: removeEmptyNode
methods.params: element: Node, notRemoveNode: Node | null, forceDelete: boolean
methods.description: Delete a empty child node of argument element

methods.name: createNestedNode
methods.description: Creates a nested node structure from the given array of nodes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets the position just outside the argument's internal editor (wysiwygFrame).

methods.name: getLocal
methods.description: Gets the position inside the internal editor of the argument.

methods.name: getGlobal
methods.description: Returns the position of the argument relative to the global document. This is a refactored version using getBoundingClientRect for better performance and accuracy.

methods.name: getGlobalScroll
methods.description: Gets the current editor-relative scroll offset.

methods.name: getWWScroll
methods.description: Get the scroll info of the WYSIWYG area.

methods.name: setRelPosition
methods.params: element: HTMLElement, e_container: HTMLElement, target: HTMLElement, t_container: HTMLElement
methods.description: Sets the relative position of an element

methods.name: setAbsPosition
methods.description: Sets the absolute position of an element

methods.name: setRangePosition
methods.description: Sets the position of an element relative to a range

methods.name: get
methods.description: Get window selection obejct

methods.name: isRange
methods.description: Check if the range object is valid

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Get current editor's range object

methods.name: setRange
methods.params: startCon: Node | Range, startOff?: number, endCon?: Node, endOff?: number
methods.description: Set current editor's range object and return.

methods.name: removeRange
methods.description: Remove range object and button effect /

methods.name: getNearRange
methods.description: Returns the range (container and offset) near the given target node. - If the target node has a next sibling, it returns the next sibling with an offset of 0. - If there is no next sibling but a previous sibling exists, it returns the previous sibling with an offset of 1.

methods.name: getRangeAndAddLine
methods.description: If the "range" object is a non-editable area, add a line at the top of the editor and update the "range" object.

methods.name: getNode
methods.description: Get current select node

methods.name: getRects
methods.description: Get the Rects object.

methods.name: getDragEventLocationRange
methods.description: Get the custom range object of the event.

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll to the corresponding selection or range position.

methods.name: command
methods.params: event: KeyboardEvent, ctrl: boolean, shift: boolean, keyCode: string, text: string, edge: boolean, line: HTMLElement, range: Range
methods.description: If there is a shortcut function, run it.

methods.name: disable
methods.description: Disable the shortcut activation. /

methods.name: enable
methods.description: Enable the shortcut activation. /

methods.name: disable
methods.description: Disables all toolbar buttons. /

methods.name: enable
methods.description: Enables all toolbar buttons. /

methods.name: show
methods.description: Shows the toolbar. /

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Hides the toolbar. /

methods.name: resetResponsiveToolbar
methods.description: Reset buttons of the responsive toolbar. /

methods.name: setButtons
methods.description: Reset the buttons on the toolbar. (Editor is not reloaded) - You cannot set a new plugin for the button.

methods.name: setEditorStyle
methods.description: set editor frame styles. - Define the style of the edit area - It can also be defined with the "setOptions" method, but the "setEditorStyle" method does not render the editor again.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.description: Set the theme to the editor

methods.name: readOnly
methods.description: Switch to or off "ReadOnly" mode.

methods.name: disable
methods.description: Disables the editor.

methods.name: enable
methods.description: Enables the editor.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Shows the editor interface.

methods.name: hide
methods.description: Hides the editor interface.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Shows the loading spinner.

methods.name: hideLoading
methods.description: Hides the loading spinner.

methods.name: setControllerOnDisabledButtons
methods.description: This method disables or enables the toolbar buttons when the controller is activated or deactivated. - When the controller is activated, the toolbar buttons are disabled; when the controller is deactivated, the buttons are enabled.

methods.name: enableBackWrapper
methods.description: Activate the transparent background "div" so that other elements are not affected during resizing.

methods.name: disableBackWrapper
methods.description: Disabled background "div" /

methods.name: alertOpen
methods.description: Open the alert panel

methods.name: alertClose
methods.description: Close the alert panel /

methods.name: showToast
methods.description: Show toast

methods.name: closeToast
methods.description: Close toast /

methods.name: codeView
methods.description: Changes to code view or wysiwyg view

methods.name: fullScreen
methods.description: Changes to full screen or default screen

methods.name: showBlocks
methods.description: Add or remove the class name of "body" so that the code block is visible

methods.name: print
methods.description: Prints the current content of the editor.

methods.name: preview
methods.description: Open the preview window. /

methods.name: push
methods.params: delay: boolean | number, rootKey?: any | undefined
methods.description: Saving the current status to the history object stack - If "delay" is true, it will be saved after (options.get('historyStackDelayTime') || 400) milliseconds. - If the function is called again with the "delay" argument true before it is saved, the delay time is renewed. - You can specify the delay time by sending a number.

methods.name: check
methods.description: Immediately saves the current state to the history stack if a delayed save is pending.

methods.name: undo
methods.description: Undo function that restores the previous state from the history stack. /

methods.name: redo
methods.description: Redo function that re-applies a previously undone state from the history stack. /

methods.name: overwrite
methods.description: Overwrites the current state in the history stack with the latest content.

methods.name: pause
methods.description: Pauses the history stack, preventing new entries from being added for up to 5 seconds. /

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resumes history tracking by allowing new entries to be added to the stack. /

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the history stack and disables related UI buttons. /

methods.name: resetButtons
methods.description: Updates the state of history-related buttons (undo, redo, save) based on the current history stack.

methods.name: getRootStack
methods.description: Returns the root stack containing the history of each frame.

methods.name: resetDelayTime
methods.description: Resets the delay time for saving history.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Clears the entire history stack and cancels any pending save operations. /

methods.name: addEvent
methods.params: target: any, type: string, listener: (...args: any) => any, useCapture?: (boolean | AddEventListenerOptions) | undefined
methods.description: Register for an event. - Only events registered with this method are unregistered or re-registered when methods such as 'setOptions', 'destroy' are called.

methods.name: removeEvent
methods.description: Remove event

methods.name: addGlobalEvent
methods.params: type: string, listener: (...args: any) => any, useCapture?: (boolean | AddEventListenerOptions) | undefined
methods.description: Add an event to document. - When created as an Iframe, the same event is added to the document in the Iframe.

methods.name: removeGlobalEvent
methods.params: type: string | __se__GlobalEventInfo, listener?: ((...args: any) => any) | undefined, useCapture?: (boolean | AddEventListenerOptions) | undefined
methods.description: Remove events from document. - When created as an Iframe, the event of the document inside the Iframe is also removed.

methods.name: applyTagEffect
methods.description: Activates the corresponding button with the tags information of the current cursor position, - such as 'bold', 'underline', etc., and executes the 'active' method of the plugins.

methods.name: enterScrollTo
methods.description: Scrolls the editor view to the caret position after pressing Enter. (Ignored on mobile devices)

methods.name: enterPrevent
methods.description: Prevents the default behavior of the Enter key and refocuses the editor.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is opened.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is closed. /

methods.name: open
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is opened.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is closed. /

methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is opened.

methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is closed. /

methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is opened.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is closed. /

methods.name: open
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is opened.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a "Browser" module's is closed. /

methods.name: active
methods.params: element?: (HTMLElement | null) | undefined, target?: (HTMLElement | null) | undefined
methods.description: Executes the method that is called whenever the cursor position changes.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Executes the main execution method of the plugin. - It is executed by clicking a toolbar "command" button or calling an API. /

methods.name: action
methods.description: Executes the main execution method of the plugin. - It is executed by clicking a toolbar "command" button or calling an API.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Executes the main execution method of the plugin. - It is executed by clicking a toolbar "command" button or calling an API. /

methods.name: select
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a component of a plugin is selected.

methods.name: onFilePasteAndDrop
methods.params: { file }: { frameContext: __se__FrameContext; event: ClipboardEvent; file: File }
methods.description: Executes the event function of "paste" or "drop".

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a target component is edited.

methods.name: controllerAction
methods.description: Executes the method that is called when a button is clicked in the "controller".

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Method to delete a component of a plugin, called by the "FileManager", "Controller" module.

methods.name: submitFile
methods.description: Create an "file" component using the provided files.

methods.name: convertFormat

methods.name: create

methods.name: retainFormat
methods.description: This method is used to validate and preserve the format of the component within the editor. - It ensures that the structure and attributes of the element are maintained and secure. - The method checks if the element is already wrapped in a valid container and updates its attributes if necessary. - If the element isn't properly contained, a new container is created to retain the format.

methods.name: selectCells
methods.description: Selects a group of table cells and sets internal state related to multi-cell selection.

methods.name: setTableInfo
methods.description: Sets the table and figure elements based on the provided cell element, and stores references to them for later use.

methods.name: setCellInfo
methods.description: Sets various table-related information based on the provided table cell element (`<td>`). This includes updating cell, row, and table attributes, handling spanning cells, and adjusting the UI for elements like headers and captions.

methods.name: setRowInfo
methods.description: Sets row-related information based on the provided table row element (`<tr>`). This includes updating the row count and the index of the selected row.

methods.name: editTable
methods.description: Edits the table by adding, removing, or modifying rows and cells, based on the provided options. Supports both single and multi-cell/row editing.

methods.name: editRow
methods.params: option: string | null, targetCell?: (HTMLTableCellElement | null) | undefined, positionResetElement?: (HTMLTableCellElement | null) | undefined
methods.description: Edits a table row, either adding, removing, the row

methods.name: editCell
methods.params: option: string | null, targetCell?: (HTMLTableCellElement | null) | undefined, positionResetElement?: (HTMLTableCellElement | null) | undefined
methods.description: Edits a table cell(column), either adding, removing, or modifying the cell based on the provided option.

methods.name: pasteTableCellMatrix
methods.description: Updates the target table's cells with the data from the copied table.

methods.name: insertBodyRow
methods.params: table: HTMLTableElement, rowIndex: number, cellCnt: number
methods.description: Inserts a new row into the table at the specified index to it.

methods.name: mergeCells
methods.description: Merges the selected table cells into one cell by combining their contents and adjusting their row and column spans. - This method removes the selected cells, consolidates their contents, and applies the appropriate row and column spans to the merged cell.

methods.name: unmergeCells
methods.description: Unmerges a table cell that has been merged using rowspan and/or colspan.

methods.name: findMergedCells
methods.description: Find merged cells

methods.name: toggleHeader
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the table header (`<thead>`). If the header is present, it is removed; if absent, it is added. /

methods.name: toggleCaption
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the table caption (`<caption>`). If the caption is present, it is removed; if absent, it is added. /

methods.name: findProcessUrl
methods.description: Finds and processes the URL for video by matching it against known service patterns.

methods.name: convertUrlYoutube
methods.description: Converts a YouTube URL into an embeddable URL. - If the URL does not start with "http", it prepends "https://". It also replaces "watch?v=" with the embed path.

methods.name: convertUrlVimeo
methods.description: Converts a Vimeo URL into an embeddable URL. - Removes any trailing slash and extracts the video ID from the URL.

methods.name: addQuery
methods.description: Adds query parameters to a URL. - If the URL already contains a query string, the provided query is appended with an "&".

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates or updates a video embed component. - When updating, it replaces the existing element if necessary and applies the new source, size, and alignment. - When creating, it wraps the provided element in a figure container.

methods.name: createIframeTag
methods.description: Creates a new iframe element for video embedding. - Applies any additional properties provided and sets the necessary attributes for embedding.

methods.name: createVideoTag
methods.description: Creates a new video element for video embedding. - Applies any additional properties provided and sets the necessary attributes.
